title: Completing Him
description: This is the third book in the Harlow Series.Jessica and Alex have a hard road ahead of them. With everything against them they must fight harder than ever before to keep it all from destroying them. While Jessica deals with a killer on the loose Alex is busy dealing with problems of his own making. Can Jessica and Alex come together and fight for the happy ending they both deserve or will they give up and take the easy way out.
author: C. Shell
